Metadata: Antimicrobial N-​methylpyridiniu​m salts related to the xestamines from the Caribbean sponge "Calyx podatypa"

Two antimicrobial fractions were obtained from the sponge "Calyx podatypa" from the Bahamas. This paper reports the isolation and identification of two new 3-substituted pyridines, xestamines D and E together with a series of N-methyl salts, xestamines F, G, and H, from "Calyx podatypa" (Haplosclerada) collected at Jamaica Bay, Acklins Island, Bahamas, at a depth of 28 m.
